titleStmt.title: [A methodicall preface prefixed before the epistle to the Romanes ...] Made by the right reuerend father in and faithfull seruant of Christ Iesus, Martin Luther ...
Praefatio in Epistolam Pauli ad Romanos. English
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.
Wilkinson, William, d. 1613, attributed name.
Watkinson, William, fl. 1573-1594, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by William Watkinson or William Wilkinson of: Luther, Martin. Praefatio in Epistolam Pauli ad Romanos.
Halkett & Laing (3rd ed.) disputes attribution to Wilkinson.
Running title reads: A methodical preface of M. Luther before the epistle to the Romans.
Leaves marked, stained and cropped, with some loss of running title and signatures.
Imperfect: title page as filmed too dark to read.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
